lead_paragraph: Alejandro Toledo and Santiago Guzman are on a mission to reclaim land stolen from a humble, hardworking community by a beautiful but lethal diva and her team of thieves. Forced out of retirement, they must recruit their new team of "Robin Hoods" to perform the biggest heist of their careers.
